Yeah, I have a son over there. 
 
 Frank


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom=
: orbhunterx@...: Tue, 27 Nov 2007 20:20:40 +0000Subject: [EVP-IT=
C] Re: One from ghostman



Hola Frank!In a nutshell I'd say it's all about=
 the the worst four letter word of the english language - Fear.If you coupl=
e that with some people's perceived loss of control over the minds and hear=
ts of others, not to mention cutting their profits, it's no stretch of the =
imagination to see those sort of discussions for what they are. I've read a=
nd studied ITC for many years. I've long waited for some device, like my fr=
iend Ron's now making, to come along for me to actually experiment with. If=
 anything, ITC research points out the grantedly subjective need for cooper=
ation and harmony among researchers, which I've heard is due to the higher =
levels of vibration in the dimension some go to after this life.Just find y=
our own place within of peace and tranquility. Bozo's like him only have as=
 much voice and power as we ourselves give them. But if you really want to =
mentally slap onery folks like that, why not ask them if they're planning a=
nother Salem Witch Trial. We all should know just how badly that is now see=
n, not to mention that Salem's now witch central of the planet. Law of attr=
action in action!My dream is to help in some way to build a bridge of commu=
nication with the otherside, so the agony and anguish of loosing love ones =
can be ended forever. Life is eternal!Keep up the good work Frank, Ron and =
everyone else!!Lance--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-=
boxes@...> wrote:>> > I'm torqued again! I was told yesterday by ------if y=
a believe that horse crap, that what we are getting is 'false communication=
'. Not only that, that we are only getting the 'bad guys'. So which is it, =
false communication, which is no commnunication, or is it evil spirits. To =
make it worse, this idiot implies he has the backing of the -------, and th=
e church believes we are letting evil into the world. I took this as a seve=
re slap to the face, very insulting to me, and every paranormal researcher =
in the world. He claims the 'real voices' he gets are made out of white noi=
se combined with broadcast fragments. Duffus!! That is exactly the kind of =
voices the living mind creates to get the voices it wants to hear. Yet only=
 his are the real voices! My old friend, you can take your 'serious session=
' and your bishop, and shove 'em. My apoplogies to the group, but I know th=
is will get forwarded, and this bozo finds me so easy to dismiss, that norm=
al e-mail would be useless. I had to cut some out for nice sakes. Frank-S> =

s on the big screen with Windows Vista=AE + Windows Live=99.> http://www.mi=
crosoft.com/windows/shop/specialoffers.mspx?ocid=3DTXT_TAGLM_CPC_MediaCtr_b=
igscreen_102007>

wlhmtagline
